name: 2D Platformer: Event Horizon- Ifrit Stones
description:
This is my 2D Space Platformer (Event Horizon: Ifrit Stones) project. 

Modifications include:

  1. Enemy placements/layouts differ in each level
  2. Information about the game is added in the Menu options
  3. An extra level has been added to drive the story
  4. Some assets were changed to cater to the story the game tries to tell
  5. Varying difficulties as the player progresses:
    1. Enemy attributes have been altered
    2. Levels vary in size and difficulty
    3. The final level was completely created using a different technique from the first two. 
    4. A surprise cameo from one of my other game characters 

Credits:

Created by Kerde Regis
